entry.title: Claiming an OP_RETURN Prefix
entry.summary: The email conversation is regarding the use of colored coins to store data on the Bitcoin blockchain with prefix "POET". The individual is asking if they should be using the BIP process to claim a prefix. Luke Dashjr responds by asking if they are doing colored coins or storing data, and suggests collaborating with the authors of BIP 160 or writing a new BIP if BIP 160 is insufficient. He also notes that BIPs need to specify an actual protocol, not just claim a prefix. The individual from Po.et is acting as Tech Lead and is seeking confirmation on the proper process for claiming an OP_RETURN prefix. The individual could not find any existing BIP claiming an OP_RETURN prefix.
